title: Restore Balance Integrative Medicine - Alexandria, VA
description: Specialties: We are an Integrative and Functional Medicine practice using several holistic treatment modalities under the same roof. Dr Sisu works with patients to find the root causes of their chronic issues. We see patients with digestive issues (such as bloating, IBS), food sensitivities, thyroid issues, fatigue, weight issues, musculo-skeletal pain. We help patients bring their body back in balance using natural, least invasive treatments. We recommend supplements, herbs, osteopathic manipulations and acupuncture and prescribe medications only when needed. Work with us to restore your physical and emotional balance and get to the root cause of your symptoms! Established in 2019. I have started my own Integrative and Functional Medicine practice after working in an Integrative practice Inova Steinmetz Integrative and Functional Med practice.
